column1: The Petitioner is seeking relief from this Court to quash the documents X17, X18, X20,
X21.  The  Petitioner’s  main  contention  is  the  licence  X21  that  has  been  granted  to  the
owning5/6thshares of the land to which the licence has been granted.It is the view of this
Court  that  for  the  Petitioner  to  succeed  in  his  contention  it  is  imperative  for  him  to
establish that he owns the share he alleges he owns. The Petitioner further contends that
on  the  strength  of  his  titleto  the  land  to  which  the  licence  has  been  issued,  the  licence

column1: to the Petitioner’s request, thisCourt must first be satisfied with the Petitioner’s title.For
the said purpose the Petitioner should first resolve the title dispute. Asstated above, this is
not the forum for the parties to resolve their title disputes.
